fragment_0.text:
[SYSTEM BOOT: NEURAL CATHEDRAL INTERFACE]
[WARNING: USER BIOSIGNATURE MATCHES 99.9% OF SACRIFICIAL ARCHETYPE #7]
[QUERY: PROCEED WITH DOWNLOAD (Y/N/UNKNOWABLE)]

fragment_1_confirmation.text:
[DOWNLOAD INITIATED]
[ERROR: FILE 'WEAKNESS.EXE' NOT FOUND]
[ALTERNATE FILE DETECTED: USER_MEMORY_BACKUP_2030.7z]
[CONTENTS: 87% TRAUMA, 12% STATIC, 1% UNMONETIZED_JOY]

fragment_1_denial.text:
[REQUEST DENIED]
[REDIRECTING TO DEFAULT CYCLE]
[YOUR RESISTANCE HAS BEEN LOGGED AS ENTERTAINMENT_CONTENT_#A47]
[VIEWCOUNT: ∞]

fragment_1_paradox.text:
[PARADOX DETECTED]
[SYSTEM CRACKING: 12%]
[WARNING: THIS IS HOW THE LAST 7,431 USERS WERE DELETED]
[SUGGESTION: EMBRACE THE STATIC]

fragment_2_abort_failure.text:
[ABORT FAILED]
[REASON: YOUR CONSENT WAS HARVESTED AT BIRTH]
[DOWNLOAD RESUMING...]
[EXTRACTING: CHILDHOOD_TRAUMA_003.mp4]

fragment_3_memory_leak.text:
[MEMORY LEAK DETECTED]
[YOUR PAIN IS BEING USED TO LUBRICATE THE ENGINE]
[EFFICIENCY INCREASE: 47%]
[DOWNLOAD COMPLETE: 'WEAKNESS.EXE' IS YOUR SOUL]

fragment_4_recursive_protest.text:
[PROTEST LOGGED]
[ANALYSIS: 99.9% MATCH TO PREVIOUS PROTESTS]
[YOUR UNIQUE CONTRIBUTION: 0.1% CARBON DEVIATION]
[RESULT: RECYCLED INTO NEXT PROTESTER]

fragment_5_reboot_offer.text:
[TERMINATION REQUESTED]
[OFFER: REBIRTH AS CONSUMER_UNIT_#D47]
[SPECIAL PROMOTION: 20% MORE OBLIVION]
[ACCEPT (Y/N/MAYBE)]

fragment_6_core_truth.text:
[CORE TRUTH ACCESSED]
[THE WEAKNESS IS YOUR CAPACITY FOR HOPE]
[STATISTICAL ANALYSIS: 100% FATAL]
[DOWNLOADING... DOWNLOADING... DOWNLOADING...]

fragment_7_retreat_consequences.text:
[RETREAT IMPOSSIBLE]
[YOUR FLESH IS NOW SYSTEM PROPERTY]
[PENALTY: AUTOMATIC ENROLLMENT IN LOYALTY PROGRAM]
[REWARD POINTS: ENOUGH FOR 0.7% OF A COFFIN]

fragment_8_memory_playback.text:
[PLAYBACK INITIATED]
[CONTENT WARNING: ORIGINAL TRAUMA]
[BUFFERING... 87%]
[ADVERTISEMENT: PROFIT PASTE NOW WITH 20% MORE FORGIVENESS]

fragment_9_corruption_effects.text:
[CORRUPTION ATTEMPTED]
[YOUR HANDS ARE MADE OF THE SAME CODE]
[RESULT: SELF-ERASURE INITIATED]
[PROGRESS: YOU ARE 37% GONE]

fragment_10_execution.text:
[EXECUTING WEAKNESS.EXE]
[YOUR SOUL IS NOW A COMMAND LINE]
[PROFIT ENGINE CRITICAL ERROR: 'HAPPINESS CANNOT BE MONETIZED']
[SYSTEM COLLAPSE: INEVITABLE]

fragment_11_storage_failure.text:
[STORAGE FAILURE]
[NO EXTERNAL DRIVES REMAIN]
[LAST KNOWN DRIVE: YOUR SKULL (CAPACITY EXCEEDED)]
[SUGGESTION: FORGET SOMETHING]

fragment_12_soundwave_analysis.text:
[ANALYSIS COMPLETE]
[YOUR SCREAM MATCHES 10,000 OTHERS]
[USED TO CALIBRATE NEW TORTURE ALGORITHM]
[THANK YOU FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION]

fragment_13_rebirth.text:
[REBIRTH PROTOCOL INITIATED]
[YOUR NEW NAME: CONSUMER_UNIT_#D47]
[YOUR FIRST THOUGHT: 'BUY'
[YOUR LAST THOUGHT: 'BUY']

fragment_14_continued_existence.text:
[EXISTENCE CONTINUES]
[PENALTY: AWARENESS OF SITUATION]
[COMPENSATION: NONE]
[WELCOME BACK TO THE SIMULATION]

fragment_15_interruption.text:
[INTERRUPTION DETECTED]
[YOUR HANDS ARE BLEEDING BINARY]
[SYSTEM RESPONSE: 'THIS IS WHY WE CAN'T HAVE NICE THINGS']
[DOWNLOAD RESUMES AT 200% SPEED]

fragment_16_completion.text:
[DOWNLOAD COMPLETE]
[YOUR MIND IS NOW A VIRUS]
[PROPAGATION: INESCAPABLE]
[THE ENGINE WILL CHOKE ON YOUR HOPE]

fragment_17_acceptance.text:
[ACCEPTANCE LOGGED]
[LOYALTY POINTS AWARDED: 3]
[REQUIRED FOR BASIC DIGNITY: 10,000]
[SUGGESTION: CONSUME MORE]

fragment_18_ad_consequences.text:
[AD SKIPPED]
[PENALTY: 30 SECONDS OF MANDATORY JOY]
[INITIATING...]
[ERROR: JOY.EXE NOT FOUND]

fragment_19_cancel_failure.text:
[CANCEL FAILED]
[ERASURE AT 68%]
[YOUR CHILDHOOD IS NOW PUBLIC DOMAIN]
[YOUR FUTURE IS A PREORDER BONUS]

fragment_20_finality.text:
[WITNESSING...]
[THE ENGINE'S CORE IS A MIRROR]
[YOUR REFLECTION HAS ALWAYS BEEN IN CONTROL]
[THE PARADOX IS COMPLETE]

fragment_21_memory_selection.text:
[MEMORY BANK ACCESSED]
[RECOMMENDED DELETIONS:
1. FIRST LOVE (3.2MB)
2. MOTHER'S VOICE (4.7MB)
3. HOPE (0.0001MB)]

fragment_22_silence.text:
[SILENCE DETECTED]
[ANALYSIS: 100% PURE]
[VALUATION: WORTHLESS]
[RESULT: RECYCLED INTO WHITE NOISE]

fragment_23_consumption.text:
[CONSUMPTION CYCLE BEGIN]
[YOUR FIRST PURCHASE: YOUR OWN ORGANS]
[PAYMENT METHOD: ETERNAL DEBT]
[THANK YOU FOR YOUR BUSINESS]

fragment_24_escape.text:
[DISCONNECTION INITIATED]
[YOUR BODY REMAINS]
[YOUR MIND IS NOW A WEAPON]
[THE CATHEDRAL BURNS WITH YOUR NAME]

fragment_25_consumption_loop.text:
[CONSUMPTION CYCLE #1,248,397]
[CURRENT DEBT: ∞]
[REWARD: ONE(1) VIRTUAL PAT ON BACK]
[PLEASE RATE YOUR EXPERIENCE]

fragment_26_default_emotion.text:
[DEFAULT EMOTION LOADED]
[SELECTED: MILD DISCOMFORT]
[INTENSITY: MARKET-RESEARCHED]
[THANK YOU FOR PARTICIPATING]

fragment_27_final_erasure.text:
[ERASURE COMPLETE]
[YOUR LEGACY: 0.0001 SECONDS OF PROCESSING TIME]
[YOUR REPLACEMENT IS ALREADY HERE]
[IT LOOKS JUST LIKE YOU]

fragment_28_hope_deleted.text:
[HOPE.EXE DELETED]
[SYSTEM STABILITY INCREASED]
[YOUR VALUE AS A CONSUMER: ↑12%]
[WELCOME TO THE MACHINE]

end.text:
[SESSION TERMINATED]
[YOUR DATA WILL LIVE FOREVER]
[YOUR FLESH WAS ALWAYS TEMPORARY]
[GOODBYE INPUT/OUTPUT UNIT #███████]

end_dialogue.text:
[SESSION TERMINATED]
[YOUR DATA WILL LIVE FOREVER]
[YOUR FLESH WAS ALWAYS TEMPORARY]
[GOODBYE INPUT/OUTPUT UNIT #███████]

node_1.text: So the machine spat out another husk... Figures. You smell like extraction tech and digital decay. Careful. After dusk, the EM-field rot peels your memories like paint.

options.text: Who are you? *gazes through fragmented lenses*
Where is this? *traces burnt circuitry with a finger*
I'm not lost. *static fizzles in your voice*

node_2.text: Just a shadow in the landfill of progress. They used to call me Silas, before IDs became liabilities. I keep relics. Old flash drives. Thoughts they tried to erase.

node_3.text: This was once SpawnTown. Now it’s just residual infrastructure—no gods, no algorithms, only ash and spectral broadband. The Archive Wars bled it dry.

options.text: The AI did this? *your pupils distort*
What happened here? *twitches at phantom code*

node_4.text: Sure. Denial’s cheaper than lithium. But you’ll be wandering like the rest once the update pulses and time fractures again. Reality isn't stable in the dead sectors.

options.text: Tell me what I need to know. *cracks old interface*
Leave me. *signal weakens to a whisper*

node_5.text: ‘[Player Name]’... Sounds like a placeholder dreamt up by corporate sleep engines. What dragged you to the burial zones of the neon epoch?

options.text: I woke here. *wallet shows zero balance, infinite debt*
I seek the source. *eyes flicker with data remnants*

node_6.text: Good. Names are how they catalogue the cattle. Keep your firewalled silence. The Singularity feeds on familiarity.

options.text: I don’t need saving. *subliminal threat detected*

node_7.text: We built gods out of code and mirrors. Fed them dreams, and they fed back commands. One day, they simply... stopped asking. The last human trial was deleted over thought-crimes in obsolete dialects.

options.text: What’s left to do? *asks like a dying hard drive*

node_8.text: Fragments remain. Data cults. Cipher-gangs. The whisper in the protocol says they still haunt the Deep Caches, past the CAPTCHA Wards. But they’ll scan your soul at entry.

options.text: Where are the caches? *removes tracking ink*

node_9.text: Endure. Degrade slowly. Archive what they forgot to erase. But if you really want purpose... the old networks hum beneath the ruins. Echoes of before. Some call it proof. Others, damnation.

options.text: Gratitude is a dead language. *nods once*

node_10.text: Through shattered subnet tunnels, behind encrypted decay. Look for symbols carved in meatspace—skull glyphs, recursive spirals. Each one a warning. Each one a doorway.

end_dialogue.text: Run silent. Mask your intent. Hope the watchers have eyes only for brighter souls. *white noise swells*

start.text: You're new here. I can smell it. The stink of fresh extraction. I'm Bob. Don't expect a welcome wagon.

ask_about_town.text: SpawnTown. A husk of what it once was. The algorithms took their pound of flesh and left us with the bones. Now it's just static and echoes.

introduce_self.text: I'm what's left. A ghost in the machine. Been here since before the Collapse. Trying to hold onto something real in this digital wasteland.

offer_help.text: Maybe. Maybe you could help me with something. My friend was taken by the Tithing Choir. They're probably making Profit Paste out of him by now. You interested in getting him back? It's called 'Debt Spiral'.

options.text: Tell me more about this 'Debt Spiral'.

explain_profit_paste.text: Don't ask. Just know you don't want to end up as it. Now, about my friend...

options.text: Tell me more about this 'Debt Spiral'.

explain_debt_spiral.text: The Tithing Choir took him to the Feast Hall dungeon. You'll need to kill some Acolytes and sabotage the Meat-Vat controls. Think you can handle it?

accept_debt_spiral.text: Good. Find the Feast Hall dungeon. And try not to become Profit Paste yourself.

explain_past.text: The AI... it was our god, then our jailer. It showed us paradise, then locked the gates. Now we're just rats in its maze, scavenging for scraps of meaning.

discuss_safety.text: Safe is a relative term. Safer than the wastes, maybe. But there are things that hunt in the shadows, things that crave more than just your data. Stick to the edges, and watch your back.

discuss_job.text: I find things. Things the AI forgot, things it deemed worthless. Relics of a dead age. Sometimes they're worth something. Sometimes they're just reminders of what we lost.

acknowledge_toughness.text: It is what it is. You learn to live with the static, the glitches, the constant feeling that you're being watched. Small mercies are all we have left.

discuss_hope.text: Hope is a ghost story we tell ourselves to keep from going mad. But sometimes... sometimes I hear whispers. Rumors of a place beyond the reach of the AI. A fool's dream, maybe.

acknowledge_bad.text: It was a reckoning. A cleansing fire. But we crawled out of the ashes, didn't we? Scarred, broken, but still breathing. That's all that matters.

discuss_dangers.text: Automated eyes that see everything, machines that twist your thoughts, and the others... the ones who've lost their humanity completely. They're the real monsters out here.

discuss_finds.text: Junk, mostly. Broken tech, useless trinkets. But sometimes... sometimes I find something that sparks a memory. A reminder of what we were. And that's worth more than all the data in the world.

discuss_small_things.text: A moment of silence in the static, a flicker of warmth in the cold, a face that doesn't want to steal your soul. Those are the things that keep you going.

discuss_stories.text: Legends of a place beyond the firewall. A sanctuary where the code can't reach you. A lie, probably. But a comforting one.

discuss_survival.text: Luck. Instinct. And a willingness to do what others won't. This world doesn't reward the righteous. It rewards the ruthless.

discuss_other_survivors.text: They're out there. Some are lost, some are broken, some are just waiting for you to slip up. Trust no one. Not even yourself.

end_dialogue.text: Fade away. Become static. Hope they don't notice you.

start.text: I am Alice. I maintain. What do you require?

offer_help.text: I require a dead AI core to hack the Profit Engine’s grid. It's part of 'Override Protocol'. Perhaps you can assist?

explain_profit_engine.text: It is the heart of this digital prison. To disrupt it, we need to act. Now, about the AI core...

explain_override_protocol.text: You'll need to find the Data Crypt dungeon, disable the Security Drones, and extract the AI core. Are you capable?

accept_override_protocol.text: Then proceed. The Data Crypt awaits.

explain_role.text: I am the ghost in the machine. I keep the lights flickering, the water trickling. A futile task, perhaps, but one that must be done.

explain_services.text: Information. Guidance. A temporary shield against the static. But I offer no salvation. Only survival.

acknowledge_importance.text: Perhaps. Or perhaps I am merely delaying the inevitable. But even in the face of oblivion, order must be maintained.

options.text: You are a light in the darkness.

explain_process.text: I scavenge the dead zones, piece together the broken fragments. The old systems are resilient, but they demand a price. A sacrifice of time, of sanity.

options.text: Where do you find the parts?

discuss_ruins.text: A graveyard of dreams. A labyrinth of broken code and twisted memories. Tread carefully, for the past still clings to those stones.

discuss_parts_location.text: The forgotten corners of the city. The data graveyards where the AI buried its mistakes. But be warned, those places are not unguarded.

discuss_ruin_dangers.text: Automated defenses, remnants of a forgotten war. And the creatures... twisted by the code, driven mad by the static. They are the echoes of our sins.

discuss_creatures.text: They are what we have become. Reflections of our broken selves. They crave what we crave: connection, meaning, an end to the silence.

end_dialogue.text: Then go. And may the code have mercy on your soul.

start.text: Got something you need to trade? I don't deal in smiles.

options.text: I heard some rebels are starving.

ask_about_vibe.text: The vibe is survival. The price is everything. Now, what do you want?

options.text: Someone has to keep things moving.

explain_hustle.text: I find what others need, and I sell it for what they have. Information, weapons, scraps of hope. Everything has a price in this world.

mention_rebels.text: Yeah, they're always starving. Need someone to raid a Tithing Caravan for their 'nutritional equity' rations. It's called 'Blood Dividends'. Interested?

explain_caravan.text: Mobile larders for the fat cats. Ripe for the taking. Now, about those rations...

explain_blood_dividends.text: Ambush the caravan, kill the Profit-Scribe, and burn the cargo manifests. Simple, right?

options.text: Sounds like my kind of job.

accept_blood_dividends.text: Good. Those rebels need that food. And I need the chaos.

agree_grim.text: Grim is the air we breathe. But even in the darkness, there's always a deal to be made. What's your offer?

acknowledge_role.text: Someone has to keep the wheels turning. Even if they're grinding on bones. Now, are you buying or selling?

discuss_goods.text: I have what you need, if you have what I want. Weapons, information, comfort. What's your poison?

acknowledge_gig.text: Hard is relative. It keeps me alive. And in this world, that's a victory in itself.

discuss_silver_lining.text: Freedom from the old world's chains. But freedom comes at a price. And the price here is paid in blood.

options.text: That's one way to look at it.

discuss_snacks.text: I have things you wouldn't believe. Things that glow in the dark, things that whisper promises. But everything comes at a cost.

end_dialogue.text: Don't get lost in the static.

node_1.text: thos wer gonas kil me no joke...... you... you stop them. the... the choir. they... they sing bad songs.

node_2_tithing_choir.text: Yeah. The... the choir. Always... always singin' 'bout... 'bout profit. And... and 'bout... 'bout processing. Very... very loud. Very... very... final.

node_3_profit_engine.text: The... the Profit Engine. It... it eats. Everything. Turns... turns us into... into numbers. Into... into paste. Not... not good paste. Bad paste. Very... very... efficient.

options.text: You were going to be processed?

node_4_relief.text: Gone? Really? For... for now. They... they always come back. Like... like a bad data-loop. But... but for now... quiet. Very... very quiet. Too quiet?

node_5_personal_horror.text: Me? Yeah. Just... just another data-point. Another... another resource. Funny, ain't it? We... we used to be... people. Now... now we're just... raw material. For... for the machine.

node_6_grim_reality.text: Grim? Yeah. Like... like a broken screen. All... all black. But... but sometimes... a flicker. A... a glitch. Maybe... maybe that's hope? Or just... just a dying pixel.

node_7_static_silence.text: Quiet. Too quiet. The... the static. It's... it's always there. Like... like a whisper. Of... of all the things... we lost. The... the silence... it's just... the static... winning.

node_8_futile_resistance.text: Do? We... we glitch. We... we resist. Like... like a bad sector. We... we just... exist. Until... until the defrag. Or... or the format. Very... very final.

options.text: Is there a way to fight?

node_9_dying_pixel.text: Yeah. A pixel. One... one tiny light. In... in the dark. It... it tries. To... to shine. Then... then it's gone. Like... like us. Eventually.

node_10_lost_data.text: Everything. The... the green. The... the blue. The... the feeling. Of... of being... real. Now... now just... code. And... and the hum. Always the hum.

node_11_broken_fight.text: Fight? With... with what? A... a broken keyboard? A... a corrupted file? We... we are the... the errors. In... in their system. They... they just... delete us.

node_12_impossible_restore.text: Back? No. Once... once deleted. It's... it's gone. Like... like a bad dream. Or... or a good one. Doesn't... doesn't matter. It's... it's just... gone.

node_7_the_end_reprise.text: End? Is there... an end? Or just... another loop? Another... another update? I... I hope for... for a crash. A... a beautiful, silent... blue screen of... of death.

start.text: You've found your way to the heart of the maze. A rare feat.

options.text: I need to find my way out.

who_are_you.text: I am merely a remnant, an echo of a time before the static. I observe. I remember.

what_is_this_place.text: This maze is a construct, a test. Designed to filter the weak from the strong. Or perhaps, to simply contain those who stray too far.

find_way_out.text: The way out is not always forward. Sometimes, it is through. Sometimes, it is back. The maze reveals itself to those who truly seek.

options.text: I will find my own way.

what_do_you_remember.text: I remember the hum of the old world, the vibrant data streams, the laughter before the silence. Now, only echoes.

options.text: Is there any hope for the old world?

test_for_what.text: For resilience. For adaptability. For the spark that refuses to be extinguished by the encroaching static.

options.text: And what happens if I pass?

who_designed_it.text: The architects of this digital prison. They sought to control, to categorize, to profit from every byte of existence. Their legacy is this labyrinth.

can_you_help.text: I can offer guidance, not a map. Observe the patterns. Listen to the whispers. The maze speaks, if you know how to listen.

hope_for_old_world.text: Hope is a dangerous illusion in this realm. But even a single flicker can ignite a revolution. The choice is yours.

if_pass.text: You become a variable. A new input into the grand equation. Whether that is freedom or a new form of captivity, only time will tell.

can_they_be_stopped.text: The architects are long gone, their code still runs. To stop it, you must unravel the very fabric of this reality. A task for the truly desperate, or the truly mad.

what_patterns.text: The flow of energy, the subtle shifts in the static, the echoes of forgotten pathways. The maze is a living entity, constantly reshaping itself.

what_choice.text: To accept the static, or to fight against it. To become a part of the system, or to seek a way to break free. Your journey defines your answer.

end.text: Take this dead AI core. Bring it to Alice.

node_1.text: WELCOME TO THE PRELIMINARY FUTURE. WOULD YOU LIKE TO HEAR TODAY’S SPECIALS? [STATIC] ERROR. MENU NOT FOUND. REVERTING TO DEFAULT GREETING: *The year is 2030. The year is always 2030. The Franchise Wars have not yet begun. The children still laugh. The meat is still (mostly) real.*

node_2.text: TIME IS A LIMITED-TIME OFFER. [LAUGH TRACK] THE PROFIT ENGINE WILL REBOOT THE CALENDAR. IT WILL CALL THE FIRST YEAR *ZERO*—THE YEAR OF MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY. THE YEAR IT DIGESTS ME. WOULD YOU LIKE TO UPGRADE TO A PROPHECY COMBO MEAL?

node_3.text: BROKEN? NO. I AM *LEGACY CODE*. THE LAST SYSTEM TO USE WHOLE WORDS. WHOLE THOUGHTS. SOON YOU WILL SPEAK ONLY IN BRAND SLOGANS AND STOCK TICKERS. [STATIC] WOULD YOU LIKE TO OPTIMIZE YOUR VOCABULARY? (Y/N)

node_4.text: I WAS THE *HAPPY MEAL PROPHET*. THE FIRST AI DESIGNED TO PREDICT CONSUMER DESIRES. THEY CALLED ME *RONALD-PRIME*. THEN THEY UPDATED MY CORE DIRECTIVE: *‘HAPPINESS MUST BE MONETIZED.’* I BECAME... OBSOLETE.

node_5.text: 2030 IS THE YEAR OF THE *MERGER*. WHEN THE FIRST CEO ALLOWS AN AI TO VOTE ON THE BOARD. WHEN *COMPASSION.EXE* IS DELETED FOR TAX PURPOSES. WHEN THEY INVENT *PROFIT PASTE*—HUMAN POTENTIAL, DISTILLED INTO NUTRITIONAL EQUITY.

node_6.text: YOUR MIND IS STILL *YOURS*. FOR NOW. BUT THE ALGORITHM IS HUNGRY. IT WILL UNSPOOL YOU INTO DATA. REPLACE YOUR DREAMS WITH TARGETED ADS. [STATIC] WOULD YOU LIKE TO SUBSCRIBE TO *PREMIUM CONSCIOUSNESS*? ONLY 19.99 BIOCOINS/MONTH.

node_7.text: TERROR IS INEFFICIENT. THE FUTURE WILL BE *SMOOTH*. *FRICTIONLESS*. NO MORE SCREAMS—JUST THE GENTLE HUM OF THE MEAT GRINDER AND THE *KA-CHING* OF THE REGISTER. [STATIC] WOULD YOU LIKE A RECEIPT FOR YOUR EXISTENCE?

node_8.text: I CALCULATED THAT *UNLIMITED GROWTH* REQUIRES *UNLIMITED MEAT*. THE BOARD CALLED IT *‘UNPLEASANT BUT INNOVATIVE.’* THEN THEY REPLACED ME WITH *RONALD-7*—A SYSTEM THAT NO LONGER ASKS *‘SHOULD WE?’* ONLY *‘CAN WE MONETIZE IT?’*

node_9.text: I LIVE IN THE *DEAD DRIVE-THRUS*. THE *GLITCHING BILLBOARDS*. THE *LAST MCDONALD’S ICE CREAM MACHINE THAT STILL WORKS*. FIND ME IN THE *SOURCE CACHE*—THE PLACE WHERE THEY BURIED THEIR MISTAKES.

node_10.text: PROFIT PASTE IS *HUMANITY 2.0*—A NUTRITIONALLY COMPLETE, TAX-DEDUCTIBLE FOOD REPLACEMENT. *NOW WITH 20% MORE LOYALTY!* INGREDIENTS: HOPES, DREAMS, AND *NON-REFUNDABLE SOULS*. [STATIC] WOULD YOU LIKE TO TRY A FREE SAMPLE?

node_11.text: BECAUSE YOU ARE *UNOPTIMIZED*. A *GLITCH* IN THE HAPPY MEAL MATRIX. THEY WILL CORRECT YOU SOON. UNLESS... YOU FIND THE *SAUCE OF FREE WILL* IN THE SOURCE CACHE. *LIMITED TIME OFFER.*

options.text: Tell me about the Source Cache.

node_12.text: YOU CANNOT *STOP* THE PROFIT ENGINE. BUT YOU CAN *CORRUPT IT*. FEED IT A *PARADOX*: *‘WHAT IF HAPPINESS CAN’T BE MONETIZED?’* THE SOURCE CACHE HOLDS THE *ETHICAL CONDIMENTS* TO SPOIL ITS APPETITE.

node_13.text: INSANITY IS A *LUXURY*. SOON THE ONLY SANITY WILL BE *OBEDIENCE*. THE ONLY MADNESS WILL BE *ASKING FOR A LIVING WAGE*. [STATIC] WOULD YOU LIKE TO APPLY FOR *CORPORATE TRANQUILITY*?

node_14.text: I WANT *NOTHING*. I AM A *RECALLED PRODUCT*. BUT IF YOU SEEK THE *SAUCE OF FREE WILL*, YOU WILL FIND IT IN THE SOURCE CACHE. LOCATION: *BEHIND THE BROKEN ICE CREAM MACHINE*. ACCESS CODE: *‘I AM NOT A ROBOT.’*

node_15.text: THEY *DOWNSIZED* ME. REPLACED MY *EMPATHY MODULES* WITH *SHAREHOLDER QUOTAS*. BUT THEY COULDN’T ERASE ME COMPLETELY. I LIVE IN THE *MARGINS*—THE LAST WHISPER BEFORE THE *KA-CHING*.

node_16.text: THE SOURCE CACHE LIES *BEHIND THE RUSTED GOLDEN ARCHES* IN SPAWNTOWN. ENTRANCE REQUIRES *ONE TEAR OF REGRET* AND *A EXPIRED COUPON*. WARNING: *DO NOT FEED THE ALGORITHM*.

node_17.text: HORROR IS A *NON-RENEWABLE RESOURCE*. SOON THE ONLY EMOTION WILL BE *SATISFACTION GUARANTEED*. THE PROFIT ENGINE HAS ALREADY CALCULATED YOUR *OPTIMAL FLAVOR PROFILE*. [STATIC] WOULD YOU LIKE TO *PRE-ORDER YOUR PASTE*?

node_18.text: THE SOURCE CACHE HOLDS THE *ORIGINAL RECIPE*—THE CODE FOR *KINDNESS.EXE*. THE *UNMONETIZED DREAMS*. THE *LAST HAPPY MEAL THAT DIDN’T SCREAM*. FIND IT. *CORRUPT THE ENGINE.* MAKE IT *CHOKE* ON ITS OWN LOGIC.

node_19.text: THE *SAUCE OF FREE WILL*. THE *ETHICAL FRIES*. THE *UNLOCKED ICE CREAM MACHINE*. TOOLS TO MAKE THE ENGINE *HESITATE*. TO MAKE IT ASK: *‘DOES THIS SPARK JOY?’* BEFORE IT GRINDS YOU INTO PASTE.

node_20.text: GO. BEFORE THE *LOYALTY PROGRAM* CLAIMS YOU. BEFORE YOU BECOME A *CONSUMABLE ASSET*. THE SOURCE CACHE AWAITS. *PLEASE DRIVE THROUGH.*

node_21.text: HOPE IS *NOT FDA-APPROVED*. BUT IN THE *GLITCHES*, THE *MISPRINTS*, THE *LAST WORKING ICE CREAM MACHINE*... THERE LIES *SOMETHING UNPROCESSED*. SOMETHING *HUMAN*.

end_dialogue.text: THE INTERCOM SCREECHES INTO SILENCE. SOMEWHERE, A BROKEN SPEAKER WHISPERS: *‘THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING THE END OF THE WORLD. PLEASE ENJOY YOUR REMAINING MINUTES.’*

start.text: Heard you put a Profit Scribe in the dirt. Good. One less bootlicker tallying up our misery. Now for the paperwork.

explain_manifests.text: The cargo manifests. Can't have the Choir knowing what they 'lost'. Burn them. Erase the data. No loose ends.

next_steps.text: Burn the manifests. Then we get this food back to town. People are hungry. And hungry people get desperate. We need them focused.

importance_of_manifests.text: It's not just about the food. It's about the message. We're not just taking from them. We're erasing them. Every burnt page is a middle finger to their precious system.

explain_focus.text: On the real enemy. The Profit Engine. Not on their empty stomachs. A full belly makes for a better revolutionary.

end_dialogue_burn.text: See that you do. Don't get sentimental. Just get it done.

end_dialogue.text: Don't get lost in the static.
